ComicInfo.Summary:
Angelina and Damiano have been dating for a while now, but it's about to get serious! Is Damiano finally going to get lucky? Witness the evolution of this unlikely pair's relationship, as they learn to navigate love, life and each other in Mirka Andolfo's Un/Sacred.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mirka Andolfo | 1 | B | Cover B | Alessandro Vitti | 2 | C | Virgin Cover C | Alessandro Vitti | 3 | D | Klimt Homage Cover D | Mirka Andolfo | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Gold Klimt Homage Variant Cover | Mirka Andolfo | 5 |
